snippet: The death toll in a collapse at an illegal gold mine in western Colombia rose to at least 12 as searchers continued to dig for bodies on Sunday.
abstract: Death toll in collapse at illegal gold mine in western Colombia rises to at least 12 as searchers continue to dig for bodies.
lead_paragraph: The death toll in a collapse at an illegal gold mine in western Colombia rose to at least 12 as searchers continued to dig for bodies on Sunday.

headline.main: More Dead in Colombia Mine Collapse
headline.print_headline: More Dead in Colombia Mine Collapse
